Attributes.description: Workshop-based class focused on writing speculative fiction, including fantasy, science fiction, and horror; emphasis on reading various genres and peer feedback. Restricted to Creative Writing majors.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Recommended CRWR 200 and at least one 300-level creative writing class.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B309
